ygData.subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too many times for me to let him live.  This is all because I let him go the first time he attacked.  As for you

Subject: Re: Chivtron Decisions

Content-Type: text/plain; charset="US-ASCII"
Content-Transfer-Encoding: 7bit
X-Mailer: AOL 5.0 for Windows sub 138
From: Rudra656@...

::Aerotaur::
    "I'm sorry Grounded but Deemos has hurt us too many times for me to let 
him live.  This is all because I let him go the first time he attacked.  As 
for you Sarge, I have just as much reason to kill him.  In our last fight I 
lost an arm and a leg defending others.  I nearly died because there were 
bots in the battle that shouldn't have been there.  I couldn't care less 
about his lackeys.  Now then, let's get to the meeting so we can finish it 
and start planning our attack."  He stands tall glaring at Sarge.
